main event: Witnesses observed a blue to red light moving slowly back and forth in the sky in Greenville, Tennessee.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 1 hour., The observation was recorded at night around 7:30 P.M., Witnesses described the light as alternating between blue and red colors., There is no photographic evidence of the sighting as per the report., The sighting was part of a Project Blue Book investigation which aimed to document and analyze UFO sightings.
sighted object: A blue to red light in the sky
